ToExpand.Title: open hexagon v1.9 released
ToExpand.Text: A brand new level pack and an auto updating system!

ToExpand.Title: open hexagon v1.84 released
ToExpand.Text:
Security and performance update.

Download on the projects page.

ToExpand.Title: open hexagon v1.82 now available for linux
ToExpand.Text:
Thanks to Lukasz Magiera (deb port) and Ethan Lee (tar.gz port), Open Hexagon v1.82 is now available on Linux.

Download on the projects page.

ToExpand.Title: open hexagon v1.82 released
ToExpand.Text:
Bugfix and minor improvements update.

Download on the projects page.

ToExpand.Title: open hexagon v1.81 released
ToExpand.Text:
Bugfix update. Scores have been unfortunately wiped for security reasons.

Download on the projects page.

ToExpand.Title: open hexagon v1.8 released
ToExpand.Text:
Online functionality update! High scores, leaderboards, version checking. Also, a lot of bug fixes and improvements.

Download on the projects page.

ToExpand.Title: open hexagon v1.7 released
ToExpand.Text:
Brand new 3D effects, a circular level, a lot of bug fixes and code cleanup. Download it and share your creations :)

Update trailer

Update: Linux port released! Thanks Ethan Lee!

ToExpand.Title: "tutorials" section created
ToExpand.Text: I added a new section to the website where I will share my tutorials and my articles. Check it out!

ToExpand.Title: open hexagon v1.6 released
ToExpand.Text: Bug fixes, custom sounds, and other small changes. Download from the projects page.

ToExpand.Title: open hexagon v1.52 released
ToExpand.Text: Fixed some annoying bugs. Download from the projects page.

ToExpand.Title: blog under construction
ToExpand.Text: When the code that generates the blog entries is ready, the blog will be displayed right here, on the home page. Stay tuned!
